Day 4 of Our Alaskan Cruise- Seeing the Hubbard Glacier ( Don't forget to click on a picture to see a larger version of it)

Johnnie enjoying their veranda


The scenery is so beautiful and eerie looking. Obie can't throw out the pictures!
Imagine complete silence punctured by a distant roar of thunder as the glacier calves!
